website_summaries.verdict: The budget-friendly Skullcandy Ink'd Wireless headphones deliver thunderous bass in a flexible collar-based design.
pros: Powerful, sculpted audio performance aimed at bass lovers
cons: Massive bass and sculpted highs lead to an inaccurate mix

customer_reviews.title: Poor Blue Tooth Reception - Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I've had some Skullcandy Smokin' Bud 2s for a year and they finally fell apart after constant use so I thought I'd try these Ink'd ones instead. I returned them though as Bluetooth reception was poor and got another set of the Smokin' Buds. Music kept getting interrupted even if I had my phone in my back pocket. I didn't go running with them, but I doubt they would stay on. I also didn't like the charging port whose cover makes it hard to get the cable in.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: OMG OMG OMGI LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been a skullcandy user for many years now. After my very old 50/50's died a washing machine death i needed a new replacement. Having recently taken up running and the gym i have been thinking of going wireless. I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED!!!!! as always with skullcandy, build quality and sound quality is amazing. The battery lasted me near on 10 hours 1 day last week with gym, a 2 hour walk and then general use around the house. I am so glad i took the plung and encourage anyone who is hesitant about these to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: paul nelhams

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair I've had
customer_reviews.text: I love these earphones, I preffer them to the bud type because I can take them out and they hang around my neck and they are easily reinserted . The sound quality and battery life is excellent and they are very durable, I listen to audio books & music everydat for hours the first set of these I bought which was the previous generation lasted for over a year of constant use, I would suggest that with normal use they'd last three times as long.
customer_reviews.author: MrAA

customer_reviews.title: High hopes for a budget headset, let down when working with iOS.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many cheaper headsets unbranded headsets from auction sites and come to expect a low quality/low price experience. Whilst this headset is even lighter than described, it does not display the battery life on my iOS device. So I am back to the low quality experience of guessing the battery level. There are no voice prompts for commands, like some of the low quality headsets have, just a series of beeps. Disappointing. The sound quality is reasonable, but the battery level display made me return the product.
customer_reviews.author: oisin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality and comfortable to wear on my bike ride and walks when I use my phone for music and feedback from my exercice app. Volume control and the odd phone call work well. My only gripe is that if I have my phone in my trouser pocket the connection is a bit flakey. For that reason the phone goes in my breast pocket or on the handebar of my bike. That aside they I found none better for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect automatically
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a broken set of SkullCandy Method earphones. They worked well and I had no trouble pairing them with my smartphone. The problem was that after powering up the earphones, they would not connect to the smartphone. I had to did out the phone and go through the rigmarole of Settings -> Bluetooth -> Connect and select the right entry. Very annoying. Returned the item for credit and bought another set of SC Method item.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. James

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for a week.
customer_reviews.text: The colours more pink than red if I'm honest. Overall the sounds OK when listening, tho a tad bit bassy on certain types of audio for my liking. But when it's used as a hands free headset the sounds quality is varied to say the least. The (more than) occasional drop out on the bluetooth connection could become an issue if it persist, and it don't half drain your battery on your phone when it's connected. I've used it sporadically over a few days before it needed to be charged. Comfortable to use, you won't notice it hanging around your neck. A mixed bag so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Terrible , honestly terrible if you are thinking of using constantly. I bought a pair which broke within 2 months of usage. Then when Amazon replaced them the same problem occurred in one month. Then Amazon informed me it had something to do with the colour. This also was not correct as onece again one of the ear stopped working. I am currently very upset and am requesting for a refund. The smoking buds 2 are a much better option for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable sound, good battery life. The silicone ear plugs are smaller than usual - the largest size is about the same as the medium from some old Sennheiser earplugs I have. Not for exercise, though - the collar flaps around too much!
customer_reviews.author: asb

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, bass too! The battery lasts enough for my daily use (I think it might last for 1.5 or 2 days but I tend to charge it every day to avoid draining the battery below 50%). Please note that it does not feature electronic noise cancelling; the only thing that could somewhat muffle outside sound is the rubber of the earbuds. But this is totally within expectations: I wouldn't expect to find bluetooth collar earbuds with sound cancelling with this price tag.
customer_reviews.author: IGarcia

customer_reviews.title: First class
customer_reviews.text: Update: One side randomly stopped working during a workout. I had took out cover with Amazon who told me that the product was still under warranty so got issued a full refund the day I posted these back (Bought another pair, £5 more expensive now but). Crap earphone for front squatting! Absolutely outstanding earphones. Zero issues, great sound, excellent for the gym and running. Battery lasts quite a long time as well. I charge them roughly once a week! Plus they were £20 cheaper on Amazon than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with this product for the price at £24.99 As I expected from this brand they are quite bass heavy but I was impressed with the overall quality of the sound. The headphones are as stated very light weight and with much of the electronics being in the band there is very little to the buds themselves. Bluetooth seems stable and the sound isolation provided by the buds seems excellent in my ears even without music on. Calls also seem clear to the other party and with the microphone in the band it is conveniently close to your mouth
customer_reviews.author: Lazerman

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous  melted as Charging
customer_reviews.text: Left the earpiece charging unattended overnight and have the dangerous surprise to see the unit overheat and melted.... Locklly nothing serious happens !!!!! Dont buy it !! can be a killer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth connection. Not all headphones are this easy to connect. And they stay connected. I like the fact you can wear them around your neck and forget they are there. I used them a lot when traveling when I need to take the buds out to hear flight announcements ....that was in those far-gone days when we could go to airports and train stations. The sound quality is decent for the price and they are comfortable. One of the best earphones around this price.
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot

customer_reviews.title: Great but 3 pairs lasted less than 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of skull candy Ink’d bluetooth headphones I’ve had. EVERYONE has suddenly stopped working after less than 6 months! They just fail to charge up! They are great when they work - the sit comfortably in the ear and rest nicely round the neck when not being used. Great sound and battery life. But they just stop working. I am going to try and get a replacement this time, as I can’t find another brand that does a wireless product that fits my ears.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy earphones are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love skullcandy headphones and did have the more expensive version of these whi h I loved, you could run with them and they wouldnt come out your ears. However these are not as stiff so not so good for running but still excellent sound, connection, distance from phone if needed is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: vicky g.

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones BUT right earbud died after 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Skullcandy Ink'd Bluetooth before and it served me well over the better part of 2 years. I got these as a replacement and was happy for the first 2 days. Third day right earphone dies without any warning. It was barely used and this has given me cause to consider. Will be returning these. Disappointed that something which I had recommended in the past has such poor Quality control / reliability. Good stuff : 1. Get a pair of good eartips and this makes commute quite comfortable. 2. Very lightweight and battery lasts a whole day of normal usage. Bad stuff: 1. 1 earbud died after 2 days. 2. Eartips included were too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Midhun Babu

customer_reviews.title: BT headset for battery life and sound quality u Dee £50❗️
customer_reviews.text: Having tried several different Bluetooth options under £50, I keep coming back to Skullcandy. The ink’d have good sound quality, two sizes of earbuds in the box and great battery life. The only reason I tried other sets was that after 18 months of continuous daily use I managed to damage the wire to one side, but having been disappointed by other types, have bought another set of Skullcandy ink’d. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Epton

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, I brought this head set in the month of Oct 2019 and it stopped working now, not sure what went wrong, it is getting charged but it's not working, completely disappointed with it's performance when it is stopped working in less that 6 months. It's my second purchase of same product, first one is also the same problem and then I thought it was only mine which is not working fine but when I started using the second product then it's the same problem. I wouldn't recommend this product as it is not having life more that 6 months. Thanks, Chetan
customer_reviews.author: Chetan

customer_reviews.title: Clear Sound, Good Bass, Not Suitable For Running (band too light)
customer_reviews.text: great clear sound quality, good bass and treble you can feel, ear buds fit nicely (comes with larger and smaller buds for all sizes), only (and big) downside is the band that goes around your neck is too light so if you go for a run it will constantly hit you in your face and fall off causing your headphones to fall out of your ears (very frustrating). 5/5 - Personal Everyday Use (commute, at home) 5/5 - Less Active Exercise (cycling, weight lifting) 1/5 - More Active Exercise (running)
customer_reviews.author: AJ Games

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry about dropping/losing. Battery life is good. A bit faffy to get the charger cover back into the port to keep water out, otherwise fine. Good connection quality etc. Don't understand the price difference between colours - my favourite colour was..... the cheapest!
customer_reviews.author: MisterT

customer_reviews.title: Earbud stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After three months one earbud stopped working and I can’t get a response on getting a replacement. These are more expensive than cabled earphones so would expect them to last longer than a few months. it’s been so relieving not to have cables I’m disappointed skullcandy isn’t replying to me about this issue. It’s great to keep it around your neck and Bluetooth works great. Sound is really good, but for spirts it jiggles and hits you if you run/jump.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kontos

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm they're ok
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these for walking to school. He walks 2 miles there and the same back so wanted to listen to his music. He says they're just ok. The sound quality isn't great to be honest. Well packaged and delivered quickly but we wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: magicfairy

customer_reviews.title: Loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a friend as replacement for her Black Skullcandy which lasted 1.5 years. She really loves them, the colour is so different and unique and the sound quality is better than her previous ones as the microphone is closer to the mouth so everyone can hear her better. She absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are great mid-volume is loud enough to cancel out surrounding noise. Surpring sturdy and amazing sound quality. Very impressed and the price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: The product has a good level of sound quality and does block out a lot of external noise. The battery life is largely correct as per the description however the issue lies with the durability of the product. I had my headphones for less than 10 months before the left earphone became unresponsive despite looking after the headphones throughout that time. Overall they were good while they lasted however I am disappointed that they are no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair in 12 months faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Just returned my second pair within 12 months. One side stopped working intermitantly and then altogther and then within a week the other side died. Return for another pair hoping it was just a faulty pair and with 3 months the same thing happened. Shame really because the sound quality is good although the white rubber buttons yellow very quickly for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan T

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product twice. The first time the bluetooth connection was very dodgy, the product started malfunctioning after 3 months and totally stopped working after 6 months. I bought a 2nd pair, got 2 uses out of them and they just stopped working entirely. They don't even turn on now. Whilst the sound quality is incredible for a wireless headset worth £30, DO NOT BUY because the manufacturing is so bad they just break.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphone
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphone, I previous had the same ones in red but loss the buds. The headphones don't have a very good range (as you go into another room it starts to cut out) but perfect for running and if you are keeping your phone close to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So they look cheap but don’t let that put you off as the sound quality is really good I can’t complain for around about £25.
customer_reviews.text: Hi there I received my skullcandy Inkkd Bluetooth headphones about a week ago I think so these are my positive and negative let’s get the negatives done first so the whole head phone set itself is made out of plastic earbuds only two sizes‘ but all I can say for a pair of earphones around about £25 the sound quality is fantastic and also The packaging is really good.
customer_reviews.author: lee the camperman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful battery but NOT durable
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is the only reason i keep buying this product; this is the 3rd item within a year. I'm a uber driver and this item lasted more than 12 hours after a full charge. The only problem is that one of the earpiece and eventually both stops functioning after 3-4 months and I have to buy another one again. The product is not cheap at all so at least it should be rugged and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault them
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair of these now. 2 for me, 1 for my wife. My original pair broke through wear and tear after a couple of years - no reflection on the product itself. Surprisingly good sound, easy to connect, charge lasts hours and hours. I use them daily and only charge them a couple of times a week. Great for running - I hardly notice they're there and they don't bounce around too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mallet

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointing audio quality compared to cheap Samsung wired ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but not cheerful. I regret this purchase. Functions correctly, just about tolerable for audio calls but awful for music! My first Bluetooth ear buds ever due to OnePlus7T having no headphone jack. I've had several pairs of £3.00 Samsung wired ear buds for years, they were far superior in sound quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speaker broke after three months
customer_reviews.text: With many options to chose from we went for a known and reputable make to buy in-ear headphones - Skullcandy. Mistake. Worked perfectly for three months - then one speaker just gave up. They were not used in the gym or during any exercise, nor outside - just around the house. Seems that even the more expensive options does not guarantee quality. Now I have the fuss of trying to return them through Amazon. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound , nice bass and loud , Bluetooth distance of around 15m no interference! Easy connection, banging and half the price as there blue , I like blue 😂
customer_reviews.author: Gungadin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for going to the gym and never had any issue with them falling out. They come with extra tips to get the right fit for your ears
customer_reviews.author: Cal Morris

customer_reviews.title: stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: After having the product for a month, the headphones stopped working. They charge but will not turn on. Checking the internet it seems that this is a common problem with skull candy headphones. According to the internet the solution is to bang them on a table!!!! Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aristotle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me, terrible microphone.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is nearly 100% great. People can however not hear me well, they claim the sound is dissorted, it has not changed whatever I did with it. Wanted to rebuy it for xmas and cant. Also couldnt write to seller, that might be my fault but I can atill not find comtact seller button.Waited few months in case itd go away but no. Dissapointed basically.
customer_reviews.author: Mbd

customer_reviews.title: broken after just 5 months,
customer_reviews.text: i normally get through a pair of headphones once every 9 months, this pair only lasted me 5 after normal wear- 5 days a week one hour commute each way, and then the earbuds normal start to go, very disappointing considering my first pair of these lasted me a year.
customer_reviews.author: tripnip87

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: My wife is using this headphones during her exercise sessions and walking times, she is happy with the headphones sound quality, phone call reception and it not falling off from ear. Over all she is happy with the headphones. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Setty

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for training
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for four months. They were perfect for running but have now stopped working. The blue charge light comes on when plugged in but they won't turn on anymore. I searched online forums and discovered this is a common problem with the model. Very frustrating that they broke so quickly as I liked them. I'm unsure if it was sweat or what but I minded them very well.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Dad is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a set of skullcandy bluetooth headphones at a physical store and Dad was interested in a pair after seeing mine, I saw that these were cheaper than I spent so I bought these for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Asprin

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item twice now, one of the earphones just stopped working both times on each. Could only use them with one side working. Somebody else I know also bought this item and the same thing has happened. I wasn't violent with them throwing them around or anything. Have no idea why they stopped working. However they were good when they actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wilkin

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds for gym training!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of ear buds for training and running. You can stick them on and zone out. The neck band is comfortable, you wouldn’t know it there. The ear bud are comfortable and rarely slip out even when pushing hard will running/training. If I were to have a gripe it would be they don’t connect automatically to iPhone 11 Bluetooth, not a deal breaker of any sort!
customer_reviews.author: Robert David Anthony Turner

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find pair with any device after 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: Liked sound and that had buttons,but after 3rd journey any device couldn't find earphones to pair with! Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Wireless headphones that stay put
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Ink'd I have purchased. I've tried other wireless sets but as soon as you take them out of your ears to talk etc., they are liable to slide off your neck. These however are perfect with their slighter tougher 'neck' which rests and STAYS but it still completely comfortable, making ideal if you use them for your commute/street jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones for the price but unfortunely not realiable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones back in march and was very impressed. Unfortunely they have recently developed a fault. The right earphone no longer works. They have been well looked affter and not mistreated. I am disspointed that they have failed after so little time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned, rubber protector over the charger is a tricky one to get in and out. Doesn’t connect often to the phone, but that could be the phone’s issue. My 4th or 5th set of skull candy headphones. Really like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for hands free
customer_reviews.text: Sound is to be expected from Skullcandy as I've bought conventional earphones before. But this wireless microphone set disappoints because everyone I call complains of poor reception and interference. Few people can hear me. Not much good as a hands free headset but fine for listening.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good Skullcandy Bluetooth Wireless
customer_reviews.text: I have been busy with listening music frequently, i have brought the Skullcandy which has given enough and also have solid 8 hours of rechargeable battery life. The fit into the ears is not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth gavireddi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Skullcandy earbuds over the years but I am very disappointed in these. These are cheap and tacky and fall very short in the high standards of my previous Skullcandy products.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product but I am yet to find any that will stay in my ears without slippage. A good idea would be to add a gaiter to stop this happening
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great price for running headphones
customer_reviews.text: Use for running and listening to music at work. Very comfortable and Bluetooth connects with no issues. Use with Android OnePlus 6t. Worn in pouring rain with a wind running coat on with no issues whatsoever . Great headphones and I've tried a lot
customer_reviews.author: Mr Matt W

customer_reviews.title: Failing already
customer_reviews.text: Only had a couple of weeks but already failing, poor quality sound and breaks in reception. Indication is that an earpiece cable is broken. If I had these for just pleasure listening would have spent more.
customer_reviews.author: gregory.12

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Brought some for more money elsewhere for myself. Hubby kept using them so brought some more at a great price. Everyone happy now. Lightweight and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Caza

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really like my headphones has a good battery life and quick to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: MR ANDREW KING

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Battery life good. Easy to use. Has microphone for calls which is better than my previous skull candy headphones
customer_reviews.author: michael edwards

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in 3months usage
customer_reviews.text: After 3months of usage, it is not working well now. Every time I switch on, I need to get the connectivity refreshed. And many at times the voice gets broken. While on calls, people complaint about my voice not clear and I have to disconnect the device. Very poor at such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Shon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: After using them for a few months I am satisfied with the quality. A standard pair would have died by now but they are still going strong
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 5 months being used 2-3 times a week. Replaced with 'Method' version which seems to have better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Gees

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after less than two months!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the product when it first arrived but after less than two months of use, it stopped charging properly when plugged into a source. Extremely disappointed. Can't use it now since it now won't charge & it's dead!
customer_reviews.author: chizzey holt

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: High quality sound and good build for the price. Cheap, but they sound good and have lasted well. Performance is better with some phones than with others - with my Pixel 2 they've been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Epic battery life and loud enough for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Bought for the gym after getting sick of over the ear Bluetooth types and wired is super inconvenient. These are great they block out background noise, they're so much louder than most earphones and the battery is the best I've experienced from wireless. Value for money is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great product but some trade offs
customer_reviews.text: Great for rock climbing, exercising and running in. However need charging every 2 days but doesn’t take long to charge up, also if you’re in a city or library with lots of Bluetooth devices this will affect connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is second time I am buying this . I still have the first one which I buyer two years ago and still using . The battery life is impressive and charging time is fast . Two hours charging for 12 hours continues use .
customer_reviews.author: gorgor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, handy
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth fab, charging cover - not so good - not picking. Quality what I expected so re-purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update. Three sets of Skullcandy headphones  now broken.
customer_reviews.text: Update. Didn’t think another set would break but prime example of optimism beating common sense; yes a third pair now useless. I’d like to know how to get a refund. Seriously bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: Wireless ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Had these as a Christmas present so far so good, don’t use them everyday just for 2hrs a week at the gym. So can’t really comment on charging duration.
customer_reviews.author: karen shields

customer_reviews.title: wind) but great for talking on the phone when walking round the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to use when walking as they are quite sensitive to other sounds (hair, cars, wind) but great for talking on the phone when walking round the house and listening to music/shows. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: 2 sets broke - not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had two sets of these break - ended up not even bothering with the returns in the end - wasted money!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph de Ronde

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I often leave them hanging round my neck whilst driving (im a lorry driver) then whenever i get a call they are easy to put in and answer the call very good sound quality for calls and music.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I brought these as there much sturdier than Dre Beats. However Dre Beats are on another level when it comes to sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Surf

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great sound, don’t get in the way. A must buy
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for general audio
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of bass going on & range could be better but very light to ware for general audio e.g.. TV. Often forget I have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The phones have good sound quality but the bluetooth connection can be erratic. It is very prone to "breaking up" if there is strong wind, or if you're walking with the ipod (or whatever!) in a bag or pocket. They work perfectly if just sitting still with the music player close by, such as on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money Sound quality really good And headphones stay put and are a good fit
customer_reviews.author: kelly smith

customer_reviews.title: I loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones...they worked right away and consistently after that. But after 6 months of heavy use the sound went out on one side and I replaced with a cheaper style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy
customer_reviews.text: Light. Simple to operate. Range is good enough for me. Anywhere in my flat.
customer_reviews.author: David Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The product was great until two months ago where it almost burn me. Suddently it started smoking from the earplugs ans almost start a fire
customer_reviews.author: Margarita G

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I like them but have to buy new ones every six months as they break
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mcadam

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again happily
customer_reviews.text: Good earphone for travelling and good sound quality but would use working out as they fall out
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Went dead after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Decent performance for the price and loved it for 4 weeks.... then it went dead, couldn’t be charged and duly returned as was still under warranty. If not for that this was definitely a 4 + star based on price point. Could have just been unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: Vin Surendran

customer_reviews.title: Good product but nightmare if broken
customer_reviews.text: Product is good I’ve had multiple pairs of these in the past. Problem is if they break or come faulty it’s a nightmare to replace them. The support for the product refers you to a website that doesn’t load and you have to put in a claim on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Borg

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These are really handy, I am very pleased with them. They don’t take long to charge and seem to last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat skullcandy for price.
customer_reviews.text: I see people saying about bad Bluetooth connection when using these, go buy yourself a proper phone with good Bluetooth because I can walk 10-15m away from my phone with no interruptions. Great product and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jedski

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is shocking and no longer working in less than 6mths
customer_reviews.text: I received these at the end of June and require charging weekly. However due to the battery not lasting I started using old faithfully set Apple head phones. The battery died again and haven't been able to charge or use them since December.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and impressive battery life at least as compared to a slightly different SK model.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Product commonly defective
customer_reviews.text: Product has a common defect where a flashing purple light signals the end of this product. Searching online shows that this is a very common issue. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy larger ear bud tips to get a proper seal, but that's normal for me and in-earphones. Otherwise no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Ear phonesExcellent delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested this product as it is for a Christmas present but the delivery time was excellent and my daughter recommended this product as very good.
customer_reviews.author: elaine fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, good durability(just don't pull them out of your bag too hard in case they get caught) Little difficult to keep on your neck if working out on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Emma Donnellan

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset .. cant hear the background at all.. just what i like when i emerce myself in my music
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: great battery
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. I need to recharge it once a week. The sound quality is great. Unfortunately it has no low battery indicator, but it's not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nicastro

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but they don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but this is the second paid of these headphones I’ve had now and both pairs had an earphone stop working after only a few months
customer_reviews.author: Ian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Buds at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking around for wireless earbuds for a while but many were expensive (~£100) but then I asked a friend who recommended these. Really good for the price. Great sound quality and noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with Excellent sound quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present and has been very well received
customer_reviews.author: hattos2

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 uses. Then doesn't turn on or take a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product whilst it works. But the inconsistent durability is the issue. This pair broke the record by breaking after 2 uses. Left feeling very displeased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 weeks then broke
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable, good sound. Worked in the gym etc However stopped working after 2 weeks so I cant give them a good mark for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Ixg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement these have a great sound and very easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.author: Step Rozier

customer_reviews.title: Great until they broke
customer_reviews.text: Liked this pair of headphones, however this is the second pair of these that one of the earbuds has stopped working. Seems to be a problem with the wiring. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Ink’d SCS2IKW-J509 Bluetooth Wireless In-Ear Earbuds with Mic - Black/Grey
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black

Weighing in at a feather light 24 g, the low-profile design of ink’d wireless won’t cramp your style during all-day listening. High sound and a noise-isolating fit deliver rich, clear audio across all types of music. For easy storage in a pocket or bag, the flexible collar packs up to one-third its original size. An 8-hour rechargeable battery lets you listen longer and the built-in mic and remote let you take calls and control your music without ever having to reach for your phone and thanks to 33 feet of Bluetooth range, you’re not only in control, you’re free to roam.

PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Headphone type: Bluetooth in-ear
 * Speaker driver: 10 mm
 * Impedance: 16 ohms
 * Sound pressure: 93.5+/-3 dB at 1 kHz
 * THD: <3 per cent at 1 kHz
 * Product dimensions: 110 x 31 x 188 mm ( L x W x H)
 * Item weight: 23 g
 * Shipping weight: 244 g
 * Frequency response: 20 kHz – 20 Hz
 * Technical details: Bluetooth version 4.1

See Skullcandy website for details.



BOX CONTAINS


1 x Ink'd wireless, replacement earbuds, micro USB to USB charging cable
feature_bullets: A noise-isolating fit enhances the rich, clear audio of Supreme Sound across all types of music, producing attacking, powerful bass, warm, natural vocals and precision highs.
Listen longer and louder with 8-hours of rechargeable battery life.
Manage your calls and music on these Bluetooth buds with the built-in mic and remote featuring call

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
